mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment_tb(id, author_name, comm, reg_date, article_id) VALUES (comment_seq.NEXTVAL, #{authorName}, #{comment}, #{regDate}, #{articleId})
mapper.select: SELECT id AS commentId, author_name AS authorName, reg_date AS regDate, comm AS comment, article_id AS articleId FROM comment_tb WHERE article_id = #{articleId}
